    Fabian Steeg (fsteeg)

        Single clustering into k clusters.
        Parameters:
        k - The number of clusters to partition the documents into
        iterations - The number of iterations
        Returns:

      • analyse

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<FlatCluster>> analyse(int clusterStart,
                                                           int clusterEnd,
                                                           int iterations)
        Multiple clusterings for different values of k.
        Parameters:
        clusterStart - The minimum k cluster count
        clusterEnd - The maximum k cluster count
        iterations - The number of iterations to use when clustering with each k
        Returns:
        The clusters for each different k between clusterStart and clusterEnd (inclusive)
